=== Presentation ===
Hi
** '''My Name:''' Álvaro Olivares Santiago
** '''Nationality:''' Chilean

I am a lawyer graduated from Law school of the Pontificia Universidad Católica de Valparaíso.

I am interesting in:
* The Ubuntu Phylosophy
* Free Software, Open Standars and eGovernment.

=== Community Participation ===
* ubuntu-cl forums
* FLISOL Valparaíso 2008 presentation entitled: "Mitos en torno a la Neutralidad Tecnológica y el Software Libre"
* Comisión para creación de estatuto de votación Concilio de ubuntu-cl.
* Member of the Council Hardy Heron - Intrepid Ibex of Ubuntu-cl
* Coordinator of the "Grupo de Recepción" of Ubuntu-cl
